title: [Discussion] Where to collect 10th and 12th original markscard
content: I am in ec but submitted my original 10th and 12th markscard in rr. So where should I go to collect it? In ec or rr ?

comments.body: I’m in EC too and submitted my documents at RR. Don’t worry, they’ll forward them to EC, and you can collect them from the office there. I needed mine for passport renewal, so I sent a request letter to the admin office and got them back within three days.
You might have to visit RR campus to get your marks cards from the MRD block.
